segments.text: Good afternoon . I believe that this house is for sale .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a look at it please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you lived here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have lived here for twenty years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Twenty years ! That's a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have been here since 1976 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then why do you want to sell it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I have just retired . I want to buy a small house in the country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much does this house cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's worth every penny of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I like the house , but I can't decide yet . My wife must see it first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Women always have the last word .
segments.speaker: S2
